mapper.select: select * from tbl_freeboard ORDER BY free_seq DESC

SELECT free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer, free_regdate, free_updatedate,free_readcnt FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY free_seq DESC) rn, free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer, free_regdate, free_updatedate,free_readcnt FROM tbl_freeboard
) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_freeboard (free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer) VALUES (free_seq.nextval, #{free_title}, #{free_content}, #{free_writer})

INSERT INTO tbl_freeboard (free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer,free_regdate,free_updatedate) VALUES (#{free_seq }, #{free_title}, #{free_content}, #{free_writer},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_freeboard SET free_title = #{free_title}, free_content = #{free_content}, free_writer = #{free_writer}, free_updatedate = sysdate WHERE free_seq = #{free_seq}
UPDATE tbl_freeboard SET readcnt = readcnt + #{amount} WHERE free_seq = #{free_seq}
